text: You don't always have to be present to support your staff. Give them peace to get on with the job sometimes! #leadership #Management
Don't leave you career to #luckyblackcats or chance. Make Friday 13th the end of your weak & the start of your peak #leadership #Management
Take your responsibilities seriously, but not yourself. Good humor is the fertilizer of success. #Leadership #Management
If your title or position were removed, would your people still follow you? For that is the mark of a true Leader. #leadership #management
You can't effectively take charge, unless you recharge. Remember to take time out for yourself, friends & family. #leadership #management
A Boss expects people to stand below them. A Leader encourages people to stand beside them. Where are your people? #leadership #Management
You can only have 2 things in life, Reasons or Results. Reasons don't count. Go & achieve results this week #leadership #management
Don't expect your employees to work at the week-end, unless you want their motivation to come to a weak-end #leadership #management
Excuses are your lack of faith in your own power. Without faith in yourself, how can colleagues have faith in you? #leadership #management
If you use phrases such as 'think outside the box', you should be hit with a box! Use plain language to engage #Leadership #Management
In the week ahead, remember, good intentions achieve nothing. Success depends on action, not intent. #leadership #management
Seek not greatness for yourself, but glory for ur team, engage their hearts, inspire their minds & they will work like a dream #leadership
Focus on making meaning instead of making money & see how productive your staff become. Value making a difference #leadership #management
Beware liars in business. False words may hide their intent, but their actions will highlight their deceit. #integrity #honesty #leadership
Don't be a person who uses a wish bone instead of your back bone. Only action leads to results. #leadership #management
Tough week in work? Take hope. Need & struggle excites, drives & inspires us; our hour of triumph is what brings the void #reflect #recharge
MGRs Disregard UR self-importance but make EVERY team member feel important & they will do what is important to you #leadership #management
MGRs - Nothing inspires others more than your own willingness to perspire, so roll your sleeves up & get stuck in! #leadership #management
Want to be a great leader? Remember - A leader leads by example, not by force. #management #leadership
For a successful project, the most vital thing is coordinating the talents of ur team & pointing them towards 1 goal #leadership #management
Every time u feel urself being pulled into other people's nonsense, repeat these words: not my circus, not my monkeys. #Management #balance
Other people don't prevent you from realizing your dreams, only your own inaction holds you back. Dream & Get busy! #success #leadership
MGR's Avoiding a tough decision in order to keep the peace isn't Leadership, but evasion of duty. Show some mettle! #leadership #management
The job as leader isn't to be smarter than ur staff, but to inspire people smarter than u to achieve great things. #Leadership #management
Turn the tables on your boss. Don't always take them problems, give them solutions occasionally to prove your value. #ManageUp #leadership
Remember - Work Smarter NOT longer - How many people on their deathbed wish they'd spent more time at the office? #leadership #management
MGR's - Motivation and encouragement are like deodorant, you need to apply it to your team every day! #leadership #management
It's OK to lose money in business but NEVER lose a shred of reputation. Money can always B made, ur reputation can't #leadership #management
MGR's The difference between Try and Triumph is a little 'umph'. The more 'umph' you display the more your team will #leadership #management
In the week ahead, don't be fearful of failing your goals, be fearful of not trying, whatever that may be. #management #leadership #motivate
A meeting is an event at which the minutes are kept & the hours are lost. Time lost is money lost & lives wasted. Use wisely! #leadership
Teamwork means: Having colleagues to achieve success with, NOT someone else to blame failure on! Work & get it right #leadership #management
Participating in a review? "Learning Points" shouldn't just B about what went wrong but highlight what went well too #leadership #management
MGR's How closed a person's mind is, is inversely proportional to how open their mouth is. Don't keep ur mouth open! #leadership #management
Stuck in a dead end job? Remember - the only person keeping you there is YOU! Don't blame anyone else, take control & move yourself! #career
Leaders need the ability 2 laugh at themselves, not laugh at their people. Have a sense of humour with moral purpose #leadership #management
MGR's: If U do nothing else this week, at least show that U care 4 ur team. Otherwise why should they care about U? #leadership #management
A Leader is: NOT someone who stands aloof from their team, BUT shoulder 2 shoulder alongside their team. Which R U? #leadership #management
Friday should bring the week-end, not the weak-end. Highlight the week's achievements by staff & enthuse them 2 return on Monday #leadership
Always praise staff when praise is due. Fact, employees who receive praise will set more stretching goals by choice #Leadership #management
MGRs: Just because u have a vision, doesn't mean u cant use ur ears. Listen intently 2 staff, their knowledge can sharpen ur vision #vision
If u want to grow ur business, make sure u grow ur people. Nurture & develop them & the business will flourish #leadership #management
A leader doesn't need rank to influence people. If ur 'power' is dependant on ur job title, u need to reevaluate ur #leadership ability.
Managers: U can't be friends with ur staff, but u should be genuinely friendly. We're all humans with a common cause #management #leadership
Managers: Make sure to ask ur staff for feedback on YOUR performance, but be sure to do something with the answers! #leadership #management
Be creative with ur colleagues - Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people #leadership #management
Relax, it's the weekend. Review ur past week, list 5 good & 5 bad uses of ur time. Build on the good & eliminate the bad next week #plan

U speak on average 16,000 words a day. Make sure at least some of these R positive words 2 every member of ur team. #leadership #management
Need to delegate work to an employee? Don't just 'dump' it on them, give them advance notice. Same as u would like #leadership #Management

Managers: Finish the week on a high. Go buy cookies & cakes, & thank your staff for a week's hard work. #leadership #management
Ever made a bad mistake? Share it with your team. They will see you are human & realize innovation requires failure #leadership #Management
Employees: The causes of mistakes are 1 "I didn't know"; 2, "I didn't think"; 3, "I didn't care". Don't let 2&3 catch u out #Management
Managers: You know u want to - Tell your Employees 2 get Lost! - To get Lost in Thought & suggest ways 2 improve  #leadership #Management
Managers: Take time to really understand yourself, otherwise how else can you hope to understand your employees? #leadership #management
